Name: Absorb
Description: Blocks 100 damage for selected team member

Name: Team cheer
Description: All allies gain unlimited stamina for 15 secs. Halves stamina after the duration.

Name: Assassin
Description: One hit kill with melee weapon. When done successfully skill will disappear.

Name: Assassin
Description: Instant death with a back-stab attack

Name: Blessing
Description: Grants Energy shield to entire team.

Name: Giant Beast
Description: Character will transform into a Giant Beast.

Name: Last Weapon
Description: Character will transform into the Last Weapon

Name: Invisible
Description: Make yourself invisible. You can move around but when you get an item| attacked| or roll the skill will be canceled.

Name: Counter
Description: Reflect half damage to attacker.

Name: Trade-off
Description: Sacrifice all your skill points to reduce opponents skill points by 1 (applies to whole team)

Name: Finding Opponent
Description: Show opponent in mini map for 2 sec. marked with a red dot

Name: Undercover
Description: Go undercover by making your team members look like the opposite team.

Name: Hawk-eye
Description: Perfect Accuracy for 5 sec

Name: Hidding
Description: "Preventing a skill card of ""Finding Opponent"""

Name: Block
Description: Block all players including self

Name: Invincible
Description: Invincible for 10 sec

Name: Iron Arm
Description: Throwing weapon's speed 2 times faster

Name: Iron Wall
Description: Be a moving wall for 15 seconds. You can not attack when this skill is active.

Name: Iron Wall
Description: Be a moving wall for 15 sec

Name: Trap
Description: Make the opponents team member look like your team member .

Name: Telekinesis
Description: Move your character or an object by will of the mind for 30 sec

Name: Pocket Size
Description: Reduce character size for 15 sec. HP 50% up. Speed 50% up

Name: Anger
Description: Target must be in the Cross Hairs to use this skill; Cross Hairs 75% up for 15 sec. (Accuracy will Drop.)

Name: Anger
Description: Target must be in the Cross Hairs to use this skill; Cross Hairs 75% up for 15 sec. (Accuracy will Drop.)

Name: Rainbow Reflect
Description: Reflects skills from opponents back onto them.

Name: Replay
Description: Revive at respawn location instantly after death

Name: Replay
Description: Revive at respawn location instantly after death

Name: Chaos
Description: Confuse the opponents by changing their keyboard controls for a short period of time.

Name: Skill seal
Description: Make others unable to use their skills

Name: Sealing actions
Description: Special actions are not available for opponent for15 seconds.

Name: Energy Shield
Description: Deploy an invisible shield for 8 sec.  Can not shield short range; back and splash damage

Name: Energy Shield
Description: Deploy an invisible shield for 15 sec.  Can not shield short range; back and splash damage

Name: Rapid Shot
Description: Rapid firing rate 25% increase for gun

Name: Rapid Shot
Description: Rapid rate 10% up

Name: Skilled Touch
Description: Switch equiped weapons quickly

Name: Smoke
Description: If HP drops under 25%; a smoke screen will protect you within 2M radius for 15 sec

Name: Mental Up
Description: Block stun or speed down once

Name: Stunt UP
Description: Reduce 25% of total damage taken.

Name: Stunt UP
Description: Deal 25% damage during action

Name: BatteryMan
Description: Character will transform into Battery Man

Name: Energy
Description: Use this to sacrifice your HP (reduce your HP to 1)  and regenerate  members HP 5 points per second for a certain time.

Name: Weapon seal
Description: Make others unable to change their weapons

Name: Weapon Drop
Description: Drop a weapon at a certain rate
